thread.section_title: Hotel Palais de Chaillot - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Value for Money
thread.title_full: Value for Money - Review of Hotel Palais de Chaillot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: an2nio83
title: Value for Money
text:
The hotel is small but the room was perfectly fine for the two of us. Stylish decor and very good facilities. I can recommend this hotel for budget Paris accommodation.
On the negative side, the elevator was out of order for some time and we had to do the 3 storeys steps a couple of times. usually is good practice to offer something complementary for the disruption.
I recommend it for price, location and quality.
Room Tip: ask for a room away from elevator See more room tips
